product_overview: A modern e-commerce shopping cart application built with Angular 20.3 and Angular Material, featuring responsive, signal-based state management for seamless product browsing, cart management, and checkout.
core_goals: Provide a clear, engaging product catalog with categorized listings and detailed product information.
Enable intuitive shopping cart management with item quantity updates, removals, and running totals.
Implement reactive, signal-based state management for efficient cart operations and real-time UI updates.
Facilitate a simple, user-friendly checkout process that confirms purchase and clears the cart.
Offer easy navigation between product listing and cart views with visual indicators such as cart item count badges.
key_features: Product Catalog displaying a grid of 6 diverse products with images, descriptions, prices, and category chips; each product card includes an 'Add to Cart' button.
Shopping Cart view showing all added items with product details, quantity controls (+/-), removal options, and a clear cart button.
Real-time calculation and display of total price and total item count within the cart and navigation badge.
Cart state management using Angular signals to add, update, remove items, handle quantities, and compute totals reactively.
Checkout functionality that shows order total confirmation and clears cart upon completion.
Navigation toolbar with the app title, links to Product list and Cart views, cart badge displaying current item count, and active route highlighting.
user_flow_summary: User visits product list page, browses products, and adds items to cart.
User clicks cart icon to view all cart items, updates quantities, removes items, or clears cart entirely.
User initiates checkout by clicking the checkout button; system displays total purchase amount and clears cart on confirmation.
User navigates between ‘Products’ and ‘Cart’ views via the navigation toolbar with clear active route indication and cart badge updates.
validation_criteria: Product catalog displays all six sample products with correct images, descriptions, prices, and categories.
Adding a product to cart updates the cart badge count and cart contents accordingly.
Cart quantity adjustments update total price and item count immediately and remove items when quantity reaches zero.
Removing items and clearing cart update the UI, totals, and badge count in real-time.
Checkout triggers a confirmation message showing the correct total and clears the cart afterwards.
Navigation toolbar correctly routes between product list and cart views with active route highlighting and item count badge updates.
All components pass unit tests verifying UI rendering, cart operations, state updates, and routing functionality.
